Fix Discord auto-thread attempting to thread in Forum/Media channels

Creating threads on messages within Forum/Media channels is often redundant
or invalid (as messages are already posts). This prevents API errors and spam.

Fix: Check channel type before attempting auto-thread creation.

Fix Discord session routing continuity (enable lastRoute for groups)

Previously, 'updateLastRoute' was only enabled for Direct Messages.
This meant that group/channel sessions did not update their routing
metadata (last channel/to/accountId) in 'session-meta.json'.

If the bot restarted or a proactive cron job tried to send a message
to a group session using 'sessions_send' without an explicit 'to' field,
it would fail because 'lastRoute' was missing or stale.

Fix: Enable 'updateLastRoute' for all Discord messages (Group + DM),
ensuring the session store always has the latest valid routing target.
